name: Neti Software Services
tagline: We do our best to deliver what we commit.
description:
Neti Software Services LLP (NSS) was setup in 2011 by experienced professionals with a focus on product development. 
Our vision and mission is –
To be a respectable company by developing innovative products, dependable services and delivering appreciable value to our customers, partners, employees and society at large, with honest and sincere efforts.
Our service offerings are – 

Product Development: We understand the product development very well. Our teams are working on products in the various domains and are in the various phases of the product lifecycle. In addition to developing products designed by our teams, we also help our customers develop their products.

Consulting Services: Our customer focused teams work with you to understand your requirements and provide customized solutions. Our teams can help you in preparing the proposals, take the ownership of the entire project, provide high end consultancy services, or be a part of your larger team. We also help our customers in setting up dedicated development centers consisting of teams that work only on our customer’s specific projects. We help our customers in software development, testing, setting up ODCs, Training and Staffing services.
